root.name: Satsui no Kaisou
root.description: OverviewIn this adventure game by Hyperware the player is a young boy attempting to solve a murder. The player can gather clues by examining sites of interest, talking to various people and keeping track of the information they've gathered. Time is an important factor in the game as talking to right people and being in the right places at the right moments will prove instrumental towards solving the mystery.
